name: Big City Vacation Rentals
tag_list: big-city, big-city-vacation-rentals, vacation-rentals, nyc-vacation-rentals, la-vacation-rentals, chicago-vacation-rentals, miami-vacation-rentals, vacation-home-rentals, beach-house, las-vegas-vacation-rental, florida-vacation-rental, california-vacation
overview:
BigCityVacationRentals.com - Where Big City Benefits Meet Local Hospitality. Big City Vacation Rentals is a vacation rental by owner site focused on big cities and their surrounding metro areas. It is designed to connect vacation property owners that rent their properties with travelers searching for properties.

There are many advantages to renting a vacation home and many to listing a vacation home on the web.

Vacation Home Owners Advantages: Way cheaper & no middleman, local hospitality with great customer service, detailed descriptions & advanced search functionality, Tips & Tools, you are in control (you list, edit & deal directly with travelers), travelers search free.

Travelers Advantage: Renting a vacation home costs less than a hotel and with more room, can take a new adventure and live like a local, bring the whole gang (& the dog), it’s like a home away from home, save money on meals and search for free.
